param.name: textleft
param.value:
[COLOR orange]HUB PROPERTYS[/COLOR] HUB_Music ( = Current) : $INFO[Window(home).Property(HUB_Music),[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] [CR] HUB_Music_PrevProp : $INFO[Window(home).Property(HUB_Music_PrevProp),[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] | HUB_Music_PrevID : $INFO[Window(home).Property(HUB_Music_PrevID),[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] Window(home).Property(HUB_artwork) : $INFO[Window(home).Property(HUB_artwork),[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] HUB_containerpath_songs $INFO[Window(home).Property(HUB_containerpath_songs),[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] HUB_containerpath_albums $INFO[Window(home).Property(HUB_containerpath_albums),[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] playlist_itemcontrol $INFO[window(home).property(playlist_itemcontrol)] [COLOR orange]CURRENT[/COLOR] Container(7000).Position $INFO[Container(7000).Position] Container(7000).CurrentItem $INFO[Container(7000).CurrentItem]
$INFO[System.CurrentControlID,Container(,).CurrentItem] : $INFO[ListItem.CurrentItem,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.dbtype $INFO[ListItem.dbtype,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] | ListItem.dbid $INFO[ListItem.dbid,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.DiscNumber $INFO[ListItem.DiscNumber,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] / TotalDiscs $INFO[ListItem.TotalDiscs,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] DiscTitle $INFO[ListItem.DiscTitle,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.DateAdded $INFO[ListItem.DateAdded,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.Date $INFO[ListItem.Date,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] Container.ListItem.FileNameAndPath : $INFO[Container.ListItem.FilenameAndPath,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.FileNameAndPath : $INFO[ListItem.FileNameAndPath,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.Path : $INFO[ListItem.Path,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.FolderName : $INFO[ListItem.FolderName,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.FileName : $INFO[ListItem.FileName,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.FolderPath : $INFO[ListItem.FolderPath,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] ListItem.FileExtension : $INFO[ListItem.FileExtension,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]]
playlistmusic:// FileNameAndPath = Container(7000).ListItem.FileNameAndPath : $INFO[Container(7000).ListItem.FileNameAndPath,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] playlistmusic:// Path = Container(7000).ListItem.Path : $INFO[Container(7000).ListItem.Path,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] playlistmusic:// FolderName = Container(7000).ListItem.FolderName : $INFO[Container(7000).ListItem.FolderName,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]] playlistmusic:// FolderPath = Container(7000).ListItem.FolderPath : $INFO[Container(7000).ListItem.FolderPath,[COLOR cyan][B],[/B][/COLOR]]
